artist.name: Park Mejung
artist.about:
After majoring in art education at Hanyang University's College of Education, she completed the International Fashion Research Institute.
She won the grand prize at the College Student Design Contest in Korea as a student.
She later worked as a stylist for commercial commercials, fashion magazines, and broadcasts.
She was a full-time fashion director at Ecole Charmant, Face Value, Juad B, Ipoh Makeup School, and gave lectures on fashion styles at several companies, including Samsung Life Insurance and Samsung C&T. 
She completed the Chung-Ang University Photography Academy.

artist.name: 박미정
artist.about:
한양대학교 사범대학 미술교육학을 전공 후, 국제 복장연구원 수료,학창 시절에 대한민국 대학생디자인공모전에서 대상을 수상하였고 이후 CF광고, 패션잡지, 방송 등에서 스타일리스트로 활동했다.
에꼴 샤르망뜨, 훼이스벨류, 쥬아드비, 이포 메이크업 스쿨 코디전임강사, 삼성생명, 삼성물산 등 여러 기업체에서 패션 코디 관련 강의를 했다. 중앙대 사진 아카데미를 수료했다.
